Sql.CDATA: Create Table AFSetUp ( [CompanyID] [int] NOT NULL, [CreatedByID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL, [CreatedByScreenID] [char](8) NOT NULL, [CreatedDateTime] [datetime] NOT NULL, [LastModifiedByID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL, [LastModifiedByScreenID] [char](8) NOT NULL, [LastModifiedDateTime] [datetime] NOT NULL, [tstamp] [timestamp] NOT NULL, AFAccessKey varchar(100), AFSecretKey varchar(100), AFBucketName varchar(100), AFDirectoryName varchar(100), Primary Key(CompanyID))
